xml.data:
Home » 5V Parivārapāḷi » 2 Bhikkhunivibhaṅga » 2.1 Paṭhamabhāga » 2.1.1 Katthapaññattivāra » 2.1.1.4 Pācittiyakaṇḍa
2.1.1.4.9 Chattupāhanavagga
Bhikkhunivibhaṅga
Paṭhamabhāga
Katthapaññattivāra
Pācittiyakaṇḍa
Chattupāhanavagga
226.
809Chattupāhanaṃ dhārentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti? Sāvatthiyaṃ paññattaṃ. Kaṃ ārabbhāti? Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha. Kismiṃ vatthusminti? Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṃ dhāresuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. Ekā paññatti, ekā anupaññatti. Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti—  eḷakalomake…pe… . (1)
810Yānena yāyantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti? Sāvatthiyaṃ paññattaṃ. Kaṃ ārabbhāti? Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha. Kismiṃ vatthusminti? Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo yānena yāyiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. Ekā paññatti, ekā anupaññatti. Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti—  eḷakalomake…pe… . (2)
811Saṅghāṇiṃ dhārentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti? Sāvatthiyaṃ paññattaṃ. Kaṃ ārabbhāti? Aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha. Kismiṃ vatthusminti? Aññatarā bhikkhunī saṅghāṇiṃ dhāresi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. Ekā paññatti. Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti—  eḷakalomake…pe… . (3)
812Itthālaṅkāraṃ dhārentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti? Sāvatthiyaṃ paññattaṃ. Kaṃ ārabbhāti? Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha. Kismiṃ vatthusminti? Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo itthālaṅkāraṃ dhāresuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. Ekā paññatti. Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti—  eḷakalomake…pe… . (4)
813Gandhavaṇṇakena nahāyantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti? Sāvatthiyaṃ paññattaṃ. Kaṃ ārabbhāti? Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha. Kismiṃ vatthusminti? Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo gandhavaṇṇakena nahāyiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. Ekā paññatti. Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti—  eḷakalomake…pe… . (5)
814Vāsitakena piññākena nahāyantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti? Sāvatthiyaṃ paññattaṃ. Kaṃ ārabbhāti? Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha. Kismiṃ vatthusminti? Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo vāsitakena piññākena nahāyiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. Ekā paññatti. Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti—  eḷakalomake…pe… . (6)
815Bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpentiyā parimaddāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti? Sāvatthiyaṃ paññattaṃ. Kaṃ ārabbhāti? Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha. Kismiṃ vatthusminti? Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpesuṃ parimaddāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. Ekā paññatti. Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti—  eḷakalomake…pe… . (7)
816Sikkhamānāya ummaddāpentiyā parimaddāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti? Sāvatthiyaṃ paññattaṃ. Kaṃ ārabbhāti? Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha. Kismiṃ vatthusminti? Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo sikkhamānāya ummaddāpesuṃ parimaddāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. Ekā paññatti. Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti—  eḷakalomake…pe… . (8)
817Sāmaṇeriyā ummaddāpentiyā parimaddāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti? Sāvatthiyaṃ paññattaṃ. Kaṃ ārabbhāti? Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha. Kismiṃ vatthusminti? Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo sāmaṇeriyā ummaddāpesuṃ parimaddāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. Ekā paññatti. Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti—  eḷakalomake…pe… . (9)
818Gihiniyā ummaddāpentiyā parimaddāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti? Sāvatthiyaṃ paññattaṃ. Kaṃ ārabbhāti? Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha. Kismiṃ vatthusminti? Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo gihiniyā ummaddāpesuṃ parimaddāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. Ekā paññatti. Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti—  eḷakalomake…pe… . (10)
819Bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti? Sāvatthiyaṃ paññattaṃ. Kaṃ ārabbhāti? Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha. Kismiṃ vatthusminti? Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. Ekā paññatti. Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti—  kathinake…pe… . (11)
820Anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti? Sāvatthiyaṃ paññattaṃ. Kaṃ ārabbhāti? Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha. Kismiṃ vatthusminti? Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. Ekā paññatti. Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti—  padasodhamme…pe… . (12)
821Asaṅkaccikāya gāmaṃ pavisantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti? Sāvatthiyaṃ paññattaṃ. Kaṃ ārabbhāti? Aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha. Kismiṃ vatthusminti? Aññatarā bhikkhunī asaṅkaccikā gāmaṃ pāvisi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. Ekā paññatti. Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti—  siyā kāyato samuṭṭhāti, na vācato na cittato; siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato…pe… . (13)
822Chattupāhanavaggo navamo.
Navavaggakhuddakā niṭṭhitā.
823Tassuddānaṃ
824
Lasuṇaṃ saṃhare lomaṃ,
talamaṭṭhañca suddhikaṃ;
Bhuñjantāmakadhaññānaṃ,
dve vighāsena dassanā.
825
Andhakāre paṭicchanne,
ajjhokāse rathikāya ca;
Pure pacchā vikāle ca,
duggahi niraye vadhi.
826
Naggodakā visibbetvā,
pañcāhikaṃ saṅkamanīyaṃ;
Gaṇaṃ vibhaṅgasamaṇaṃ,
dubbalaṃ kathinena ca.
827
Ekamañcattharaṇena,
sañcicca sahajīvinī;
Datvā saṃsaṭṭhaanto ca,
tirovassaṃ na pakkame.
828
Rājā āsandi suttañca,
gihi vūpasamena ca;
Dade cīvarāvasathaṃ,
pariyāpuṇañca vācaye.
829
Ārāmakkosacaṇḍī ca,
bhuñjeyya kulamaccharī;
Vāse pavāraṇovādaṃ,
dve dhammā pasākhena ca.
830
Gabbhī pāyantī cha dhamme,
asammatūnadvādasa;
Paripuṇṇañca saṃghena,
saha vuṭṭhā cha pañca ca.
831
Kumārī dve ca saṃghena,
dvādasa sammatena ca;
Alaṃ sace ca dvevassaṃ,
saṃsaṭṭhā sāmikena ca.
832
Pārivāsikānuvassaṃ,
duve vuṭṭhāpanena ca;
Chattayānena saṅghāṇi,
itthālaṅkāravaṇṇake.
833
Piññākabhikkhunī ceva,
sikkhā ca sāmaṇerikā;
Gihi bhikkhussa purato,
anokāsaṃ saṅkaccikāti.
834Tesaṃ vaggānaṃ uddānaṃ
835
Lasuṇandhakārā nhānā,
tuvaṭṭā cittagārakā;
Ārāmaṃ gabbhinī ceva,
kumārī chattupāhanāti.
<< 2.1.1.4.8 Kumāribhūtavaggaup2.1.1.5 Pāṭidesanīyakaṇḍa >>
